title: The Creators (Daniel J. Boorstin)
description:
Title: The Creators - A History of Heroes of the Imagination
Author: Daniel J. Boorstin
Narrator: Michael Jackson
Format: Abridged Audiobook (MP3) + Unabridged Ebook (PDF)

The second volume of historian Daniel J. Boorstin's "Knowledge Trilogy". The first volume, The Discoverers, covers explorers, scientists, and historians in their quest for raw knowledge. The second volume, The Creators, describes writers, painters, and composers in their pursuit of inspiring art. The third and final volume, The Seekers, describes people searching for an understanding of human existence itself
